name: 2d-sandbox
description:
A 2d sandbox made with gdevelop, for gdvelop game jam.

The music was made with Bosca Ceoil, the 2d assets with piskel (GDvelop default image editor).  Most of sounds were taken from Scratch library.

It's a sandbox, so you can build, destroy and rebuild the universe.

contols:

Arrows to move, spacebar to jump,  a and d to change what block you are selecting, right click to place a block, maintain right click then release on the block you want to mine to mine it.

To have a tool you must destroy grass, mushrooms and webs.

Try to get some diamonds and some emeralds blocks!

And just have fun!
